data.text: @Der_Parrot I find it interesting how their political stance is completely different in different countries or even under different US presidents.
@Der_Parrot I remember rt claiming that Vax passports are a tool for control. Then I found out that Russia had already implemented them.

@left_footin @Egoquaereresci1 @CrowdDemon @Der_Parrot Thank you saying that; censorship is a very dangerous thing. All these arrogant Euros who are celebrating RT getting banned are fools. If they censor RT they will censor all kinds of speech until only the those who agree with the ruling party can speak.

@Egoquaereresci1 @MartinK17771822 @CrowdDemon @Der_Parrot Opposing censorship is a pillar of progressivism.
Censorship is always a bad thing. 
It will eventually get used against you.
https://t.co/xszFgkffVs

@Egoquaereresci1 @MartinK17771822 @CrowdDemon @Der_Parrot Then I would say you repeat propaganda like you are an authority but in reality you did not watch it.
Their journalists absolutely do speak out against the Russian government all the time.
And it had much much less propaganda than CNN.
That is why they needed it censored.
@Der_Parrot I have mixed feeling about that. Free Speech is always messy and this could fuel so more bad habits…

@Der_Parrot Indeed. But I do ask: do you think the BBC, CNN or France24 do not engage in geopolitical manipulation? Sure, not on those issues. But certainly on news pertaining to Latin America, former colonies or even Russia.

Putin won when the EU decided to act like him. He knows that.
